QuestData.Title: Investigating the Invasion
QuestData.Description: I'm going to lead a small squad behind enemy lines.$b$bMeet me by Dreadmaul, $c. From there we can decide our next course of action.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Maraad in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: Glad you made it, $n. It's time to start pushing back on this Iron Horde invasion.
